title: Ultra-rich women in Europe in 2014 , by personal fortune value
yAxis: Value of wealth in billion euros
summary: This bar chart has 10 categories for the x axis representing Month, and a y axis representing Value of wealth in billion euros.
The highest category is found at Liliane_Bettencourt_(L’Oréal_France) where Value of wealth in billion euros is 25.1.
The lowest category is found at Elisabeth_Mohn_(Bertelsmann_Germany) where Value of wealth in billion euros is 4.3.

data.Month: Antonia Axson Johnson (Axel Johnson Group Sweden)

gold: The statistic displays the ranking of ten wealthiest women in Europe as of July 2014 . At that time , the richest woman in Europe was Liliane Bettencourt , the heiress of the French cosmetics and beauty company L'Oreal , with personal fortune amounting to approximately 25 billion euros .
